meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fanatical.
meanings.sent1: Her fanaticalness about collecting stamps was unmatched by anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The fanaticalness of the soccer fans was evident in their loud cheers and colorful banners.
meanings.sent3: His fanaticalness for organizing his bookshelf by color made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The fanaticalness of her dedication to her craft was like a blazing fire that never dimmed.
meanings.sent5: The fanaticalness of his devotion to his favorite band was truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: The fanaticalness of the young artist was evident in the countless hours she spent perfecting her paintings.
meanings.sent2: His fanaticalness for running marathons led him to train every day, rain or shine.
meanings.sent3: The fanaticalness of her love for chocolate was evident in the way she always had a stash in her bag.
meanings.sent4: The fanaticalness with which he pursued his dreams was like a force of nature that could not be stopped.
meanings.sent5: Her fanaticalness for solving puzzles made her the reigning champion in the game club.
